message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering it to you for $102.50.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
I understand you're close to your budget, Bob, but I'd like to get a bit closer to my target. I'm willing to offer it to you for $107.50.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $105 for the product.
I'm getting close to my target, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $106, but I'm not going any lower. How about we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your effort, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $104 for the product.
I'm not willing to go as low as $104, Bob. I'm still holding out for $108. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product.
Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a final price of $106 for the product.
